entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or drizzle and a few flurries changing to periods of snow this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
